snippet: In recent months, China has made it harder for American investors to check the legitimacy of their Chinese investments.
abstract: Floyd Norris High & Low Finance column observes that China has been making it harder for American investors to check the legitimacy of their Chinese investments; asserts that optimism appears to be rising that the Securities and Exchange Commission can reach some kind of agreement with China to get help in probing a wave of frauds at Chinese firms, but it is far from clear that all Chinese officials want to surrender control over exclusive access to information.
lead_paragraph: In recent months, China has made it harder for American investors to check the legitimacy of their Chinese investments.

headline.print_headline: In China, Little Urge To Audit The Auditors
headline.seo: In China, Discomfort Over Inspecting the Inspectors
headline.main: In China, Little Urge to Audit the Auditors
